name: Puzzle Boards
description:
This game simulates a classic math puzzle game. It requires you to cleverly rearrange the titles to the target pattern.
Game Features:
- 6 levels of difficulty, with board sizes from 3 to size 8
- A slick neon theme design
- Simple to get started, hard to become master
- A built-in leaderboard allows users to compare their score with their friends or other players.
Besides, there are some other easy-to-play mini games to help you relax. Challenge your brain and have fun with this game.
